fullText:
Echoing Rejuvenation

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Goliath, stone’s endurance racial power, artificer, Arcane Rejuvenation class feature
Benefit: When an ally gains temporary hit points from Arcane Rejuvenation, you gain resist 2 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 33.
name: Echoing Rejuvenation
